alert.note: Alert for Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 29 at 8:42PM CDT until September 29 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WAYNE AND NORTHWESTERN STANTON COUNTIES... At 841 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hoskins, or 8 miles northeast of Norfolk, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 838 PM, quarter size hail was reported 4 miles east of Norfolk. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Winside and Hoskins. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
